Package Controllers

Class CustomersScreen

java.lang.Object
Controllers.CustomersScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomersScreen extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the CustomersScreen class which is a controller and implements an Initializable method. This class handles all functionality for the customers screen of the application.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCustomer (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method retrieves all input from text fields and combo boxes and adds the customer to the customers table Uses the checkInput() method to validate if all text fields and combo boxes have been populated.
    boolean
    checkInput()
    This method validates if the text fields and combo boxes on the customers form are populated and returns a boolean
    void
    clearAllFields (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    This method clears all text fields and combo box selections by reloading the customers screen.
    void
    countrySelected (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method that will filter the divisions in the divisions combo box to match that countries' countryId once the user selects a country in the country combo box.
    void
    deleteCustomer (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method checks to make sure the user has selected a customer and if so, that customer is deleted from the customers table.
    void
    initialize (URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    Initialization method retrieves and sets all the customer data for the customers tableview and the country and division data for the combo boxes.
    void
    modifyCustomer (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    This method checks to make sure a customer is selected, and if one is, it populates the text fields and combo boxes with the data associated with that customer.If a customer is not selected first, than an error message is displayed.
    void
    toAppointmentScreen (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Navigates the user to the appointment screen.
    void
    toReportsScreen (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Navigates the user to the ReportsScreen.
    void
    updateCustomer (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    This method retrieves all the input from the text fields, and combo boxes and updates that customers object in the database with the new data.

    • CustomersScreen

      public CustomersScreen()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize (URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initialization method retrieves and sets all the customer data for the customers tableview and the country and division data for the combo boxes.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The uniform Resource Locator that is a pointer to a location.
      resourceBundle - Contains locale specific objects for the class.

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method retrieves all input from text fields and combo boxes and adds the customer to the customers table Uses the checkInput() method to validate if all text fields and combo boxes have been populated.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the addCustomerBtn is pressed.

    • clearAllFields

      public void clearAllFields (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method clears all text fields and combo box selections by reloading the customers screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the clearBtn is pressed.

    • countrySelected

      public void countrySelected (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method that will filter the divisions in the divisions combo box to match that countries' countryId once the user selects a country in the country combo box.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When a selection is made in the countryCombo combo box is made.

    • modifyCustomer

      public void modifyCustomer (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method checks to make sure a customer is selected, and if one is, it populates the text fields and combo boxes with the data associated with that customer.If a customer is not selected first, than an error message is displayed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the modifyCustomerBtn is pressed.

    • updateCustomer

      public void updateCustomer (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method retrieves all the input from the text fields, and combo boxes and updates that customers object in the database with the new data. It also has input validation for blank fields.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the updateCustomerBtn is pressed.

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method checks to make sure the user has selected a customer and if so, that customer is deleted from the customers table. Checks for associated appointments and deletes those first before deleting the customer.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the deleteCustomerBtn is pressed.

    • checkInput

      public boolean checkInput()
      This method validates if the text fields and combo boxes on the customers form are populated and returns a boolean
      Returns:
      Boolean true or false.

    • toAppointmentScreen

      public void toAppointmentScreen (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Navigates the user to the appointment screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the manageAptBtn is pressed.

    • toReportsScreen

      public void toReportsScreen (javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Navigates the user to the ReportsScreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the reportsBtn is pressed.
